oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The admiration of Bushman women for the horse. The sound of the cantering of horses imitated by them. By /han kass o (L VIII.
8740). The women sit with a rolled up kaross between their knees and slap it making the sound of the horse.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !kuppen (imitation of the sound of horses)
